    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes Promotion

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:StringShort
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Promotion

      • Description

        Description of the promotion.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Promotion code="Example String Value" name="Example String Value" promotionVendorCode="Example String Value Example String Value Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">Example String Value</Promotion>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Promotion" : {
    "value" : "Example String Value",
    "promotionVendorCode" : [ "Example", "String", "Value", "Example", "String", "Value", "Example", "String", "Value" ],
    "code" : "Example String Value",
    "name" : "Example String Value"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        promotionVendorCode
        List of the vendor codes associated with a promotion.
        Details
        Type ListOfTinyStrings
        Example Value Example String Value Example String Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        code
        The code for the promotion.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        name
        The name of the promotion.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
